content.content: 1. The species listed in Schedule 1 are prescribed as furbearing mammals. O. Reg. 432/20, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The species listed in Schedule 1 are prescribed as furbearing mammals. O. Reg. 432/20, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The species listed in Schedule 2 are prescribed as game mammals. O. Reg. 432/20, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 2. The species listed in Schedule 2 are prescribed as game mammals. O. Reg. 432/20, s. 1.

content.content: 3. The species listed in Schedule 3 are prescribed as game birds. O. Reg. 432/20, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 3. The species listed in Schedule 3 are prescribed as game birds. O. Reg. 432/20, s. 1.

content.content: 4. The species listed in Schedule 4 are prescribed as game reptiles. O. Reg. 432/20, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 4. The species listed in Schedule 4 are prescribed as game reptiles. O. Reg. 432/20, s. 1.

content.content: 5. The species listed in Schedule 5 are prescribed as game amphibians. O. Reg. 432/20, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 5. The species listed in Schedule 5 are prescribed as game amphibians. O. Reg. 432/20, s. 1.

content.content: 6. The species listed in Schedule 6 are prescribed as specially protected mammals. O. Reg. 432/20, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 6. The species listed in Schedule 6 are prescribed as specially protected mammals. O. Reg. 432/20, s. 1.

content.content: 7. The species listed in Schedule 7 are prescribed as specially protected raptors. O. Reg. 432/20, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 7. The species listed in Schedule 7 are prescribed as specially protected raptors. O. Reg. 432/20, s. 1.

content.content: 8. The species listed in Schedule 8 are prescribed as specially protected birds. O. Reg. 432/20, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 8. The species listed in Schedule 8 are prescribed as specially protected birds. O. Reg. 432/20, s. 1.

content.content: 9. The species listed in Schedule 9 are prescribed as specially protected reptiles. O. Reg. 432/20, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 9. The species listed in Schedule 9 are prescribed as specially protected reptiles. O. Reg. 432/20, s. 1.

content.content: 10. The species listed in Schedule 10 are prescribed as specially protected amphibians. O. Reg. 432/20, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 10. The species listed in Schedule 10 are prescribed as specially protected amphibians. O. Reg. 432/20, s. 1.

content.content:
